properties.entry: SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MEM_ID, MESSAGE_TITLE, SEND_DATE, READ_STATUS FROM TB_MESSAGE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = SENDER) WHERE ? = ? AND TB_MESSAGE.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC
UPDATE TB_MESSAGE SET READ_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MESSAGE_NO = ?

SELECT MESSAGE_TITLE, MEM_ID, SEND_DATE, MESSAGE_CONTENT
FROM TB_MESSAGE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = RECEIVER) WHERE MESSAGE_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
INSERT INTO TB_MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_NO , SENDER , RECEIVER , MESSAGE_TITLE , MESSAGE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
